content: MT-SP OC Slider plate Universal low-friction interface for use between pipes and MT girders with improved temperature and UV-resistance ### Categories: Home > Products > Modular support systems > Modular support accessories > Modular support system accessories- - - ### FEATURES:Features Part of the Hilti MT system – an economical, all-in-one solution for virtually all modular MEP support structures Improved temperature and UV resistance – suitable for heat exposure with media temperature of up to 150°C (302°F) to help ensure extended lifetime in both indoor and outdoor environments Easier to fix to MT girders with a snap-fit mechanism in a horizontal, vertical, or overhead orientation Robust solution for line and plain guides in combination with U-bolts, pipe shoes Applications Facilitating pipe shoe movement due to thermal expansion or contraction Helping to prevent contact corrosion between the pipe and support system Insulating against heat transfer from media to the surrounding girders Suitable for application temperature of up to 150°C (302°F) and can be used in indoor or outdoor environments Can be used with all boxed profiles from MT-70 up to MT-100 as well as with MT-U-GL1 ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material composition: PA66-GF30 (UV-stabilised) Surface finish: n/a Material thickness: 6 mm Technical Data | Material composition | PA66-GF30 (UV-stabilised) | Surface finish | n/a ### ITEMS- 2368807 - Modular Slider Plate for Closed Girders - Package Size 10 pc
